mapper.select: SELECT C.EMP_NUM, E.EMP_NAME, C.COMMUTE_INTIME, C.COMMUTE_OUTTIME, C.COMMUTE_STATUS FROM COMMUTE C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM WHERE C.EMP_NUM = #{empNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUTE SET COMMUTE_OUTTIME =NOW(), COMMUTE_STATUS = 2 WHERE EMP_NUM = #{empNum} AND COMMUTE_OUTTIME IS NULL
